channel.title: Player sorting
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Player sorting"

item.title: Re: Player sorting
item.content:encoded:
oks I'll go and do that

This is cana by the way I cant get logged on for some reason, It happed before so it fixes it self

item.title: Re: Player sorting
item.content:encoded: Yes, you have to be a member of the site first, and be logged on to make any changes. It helps prevent anonymous people from vandalizing the site.

item.title: Re: Player sorting
item.content:encoded:
Thanks Jupiah

In order to edit the page do I haft send a request to join the site first?

item.title: Re: Player sorting
item.content:encoded:
Your page is up under Nightmare Village now. I took care of it for you.

To do it yourself in the future, you will have to first create your profile, and then edit the main player page and set up a link to your profile. If you don't do that last part, your profile will be impossible to find without using the search function.

The code will look like this:

 ++ <village name here> * [[[player:<profile name here>]]]

This was the exact code used for your profile page:

 ++ Nightmare Village * [[[player:Cana]]]

The end result of linking to your profile looks like this:

Nightmare Village

  • Cana

And remember, if you are adding a new village, make sure to place it among the others in alphabetical order, to keep things organized.

item.title: Player sorting
item.content:encoded:
Hi there

First things first
Great site youve helped me and my small village load and weve all been on the look out for any thing we could add to the site

In the player page where all of the players with pages are sorted by village I was wondering if I could get my page put up there since my village leader hasnt made a page yet as he wont be back for a few days yet, but I noticed that other ppl dont have village page but they are up under their village name, so how do would I or could I put my page up?

Keep up the great work on the page guys(and gals)
